code: var HANDS=['rock','scissor','paper'];var WINS={rock:'scissor',scissor:'paper',paper:'rock'};export function compareHand(a,b){if(WINS[a]===b)return 1;if(WINS[b]===a)return-1;return 0;}function random(n){return Math.floor(Math.random()*n);}export function generateRandomHand(){var idx=random(HANDS.length);return HANDS[idx];}
